Literature.Title: Contribution of each amino acid residue in polymyxin B(3) to antimicrobial and lipopolysaccharide binding activity.
Literature.Author: Kanazawa K, Sato Y, Ohki K, Okimura K, Uchida Y, Shindo M, Sakura N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli IFO 12734(MIC=256µM),Salmonella typhimurium IFO 12529(MIC=>512µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3080(MIC=>512µM)
